comments.max_dimension: Max frame dimension in pixels (null for full resolution, or 800 for faster processing)
comments.duration: Max duration to process in seconds (null for full video, or 600 for first 10 minutes)
comments.frame_interval: Interval between frames in seconds (default: 1.0-2.0 recommended)
comments.hwaccel: Hardware acceleration for decoding (null for software, 'videotoolbox' for macOS, 'vaapi' for Linux, 'd3d11va'/'dxva2' for Windows)
comments.show_name: TV show name for TMDB lookup (required if using TMDB)
comments.tmdb_api_key: TMDB API key (null to use TMDB_API_KEY environment variable)
comments.input_directory: Directory path containing video files to process (all .mkv files will be processed)
comments.episode_titles: Optional manual episode titles to append to TMDB results (used for fuzzy matching)
